vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξουδεν-όω,
set at naught, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be rejected, treated with contempt
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be rejected, treated with contempt
also spelled ἐξουδενόω, to treat with contempt, Mk. 9:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: tratar con desprecio, despreciar, menospreciar ; desdeñar; rechazar
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: khinh rẻ; khinh dể. ἐκ (G1537) + οὐδείς (G3762)
